column4: I've added another partition to fstab and mounted it.. I want to make sure that when it auto mounts it's "read/write" capable.. fstab line looks like "UUID="7d4a2d7f-aee9-4dfa-bb47-76314a1acf79"     /media/Data     ext4    defaults        0       2
